cpp11BracedListStyle.head: Braced list style
cpp11BracedListStyle.note: If `true`, format braced lists as best suited for C++11 braced lists.

spaceBeforeCpp11BracedList.head: Space before braced list
spaceBeforeCpp11BracedList.note: If `true`, a space will be inserted before a C++11 braced list used to initialize an object (after the preceding identifier or type).
